body:
Day 9 - Manga 72 Once again I ask for forgiveness brothers, not in blood, but in soul for giving up. This time however I will catch all of you by the end of the road and put my name in the hall of Fame together with yours.
The art was once again shitty and Japanese is still a foreign language so 2/10.
another one with bad art ffs, 2/10
4/10 not bad nice cummie on her ass

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me. I Know this may be seem nonsense but not gonna risk , but I don't want to cause too many trouble too so I try select very old manga hope no one read this comment also no ntr here
